github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr: Follow the comprehensive coding guidelines and architectural patterns defined in the copilot-instructions.md file at the project root. Focus exclusively on the FitFileViewer Electron application located in the root and electron-app/ directories. Ignore fit-test-files/, vscode-extension/, vis/, and other non-core project folders. Use the established modular architecture with utilities in utils/, follow the ES6+ module patterns, implement proper error handling, support the theme system, and maintain the security model with context isolation. Prioritize performance, accessibility, and cross-platform compatibility. Reference existing patterns in main.js, renderer.js, preload.js, and the utils/ modules when suggesting code changes.
